channel.title: Comments on: Monday Go Meditation: Game 59

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Hoorah! Thanks for opening my mind to new possibilities!
item.content:encoded: Hoorah! Thanks for opening my mind to new possibilities!

item.title: By: Spot
item.dc:creator: Spot
item.description: S8 is what I was thinking of. Correct!
item.content:encoded: S8 is what I was thinking of. Correct!

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: The crosscut at S8 looks interesting to me, but perhaps that's thinking too small. The hone move seems to be pulling back at Q9. Am I close?
item.content:encoded: The crosscut at S8 looks interesting to me, but perhaps that’s thinking too small. The hone move seems to be pulling back at Q9. Am I close?

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Really? Haha. I am awful with positional judgment. Can't believe I would still win even with a sacrifice like that! Thanks for pointing it out!
item.content:encoded: Really? Haha. I am awful with positional judgment. Can’t believe I would still win even with a sacrifice like that! Thanks for pointing it out!

item.title: By: Spot
item.dc:creator: Spot
item.description: I know you're white, but can you improve on black's 39th move?
item.content:encoded: I know you’re white, but can you improve on black’s 39th move?

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: I am grateful to hear that these game reviews are actually valuable and instructive. Thanks so much for your support! I will continue working hard to make sure they meet your expectations and more!
item.content:encoded: I am grateful to hear that these game reviews are actually valuable and instructive. Thanks so much for your support! I will continue working hard to make sure they meet your expectations and more!

item.title: By: MolokaiCowboy
item.dc:creator: MolokaiCowboy
item.description: Another very instructive move-by-move game! Kudos for taking time to do these. I think I am learning more from you than from Takagawa. :)
item.content:encoded: Another very instructive move-by-move game! Kudos for taking time to do these. I think I am learning more from you than from Takagawa. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Great point. Q11 is a move that did not occur to me, but now that you've pointed it out, I can see the power of it if I were to play it. I'll have to try and spot that during my games when I'm actually playing next time! Haha. Thanks for your guidance!
item.content:encoded: Great point. Q11 is a move that did not occur to me, but now that you’ve pointed it out, I can see the power of it if I were to play it. I’ll have to try and spot that during my games when I’m actually playing next time! Haha. Thanks for your guidance!
